mapper.select:
select * from (select * from (select code, category, goods_name, real_price, goods_img1, to_char(writedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') writedate from goods
where writedate <= sysdate order by writedate desc)
where writedate <= sysdate order by good desc)
where writedate <= sysdate and category='${category}'order by enddate asc)
where writedate <= sysdate and category='${category}'order by enddate asc)
where writedate <= sysdate and category='${category}' order by writedate desc)
where writedate <= sysdate and category='${category}' order by good desc)
where rownum<=(${nowPage}*${onePageRecord}) order by writedate desc) where rownum<=${lastPageRecordCount} order by writedate asc
)
select code, category, goods_name, real_price, stock, stack, goods_info, goods_img1 from goods where code='${code}'
select count(goods_name) from goods where enddate >= sysdate order by enddate
mapper.insert: insert into goods_review (num, code, userid, subject, content, writedate, grade, ip) values(a_sq.nextval,'${code}','${userid}','${subject}','${content}',sysdate, ${grade}, '${ip}')
mapper.update: update goods_review set grade='${grade}', subject='${subject}', content='${content}' where num=${num}
